attributionInfo.mlsDisclaimer:
The data relating to real estate for sale on this web site comes in part from the Broker Reciprocity Program of GAMLS. All real estate listings are marked with the GAMLS Broker Reciprocity thumbnail logo and detailed information about them includes the name of the listing brokers.
The broker providing these data believes them to be correct, but advises interested parties to confirm them before relying on them in a purchase decision.

data.description: WELCOME TO THIS LUXURIOUS DUNWOODY WAY!  This IMPECCABLE upscale single family home is located in Del Webb at Sun City Peachtree 55+ community in Griffin, Georgia.  This incredible lot with a lush landscaped berm that you own, offers approximately 1/4 acre of land for you to enjoy.  This home is UNIQUE as it has 3 BEDROOMS and 3 FULL BATHS and a 2 car plus golf cart garage. MEN, I AM SPEAKING DIRECTLY TO YOU NOW!!  This garage has a 4 foot extension also equaling 646 square ft. and ROCKSOLID,  the world's toughest coating, industrial-grade polycuramine which is 20X stronger than epoxy applied to the garage floor. It also has been painted and trim installed. Yes, it is everyman's DREAM! Next as you walk to the front door this home is aesthetically pleasing to the eyes with impressive stone on the front, newly painted exterior and an architectural roof.  As you enter the front door into the foyer, you sense the grand openness of this home when you  glance through the home to the landscaped back yard.  The deluxe spacious Chef's kitchen is open to the dining room with crown molding and judges' panels, large Great room with a gas fireplace and sunroom and covered porch which faces the east and has a wall of windows which brings natural light flowing through the home.   The deluxe gourmet kitchen features top of the line white cabinets, farmhouse sink, stainless steel cooktop, wall oven and microwave, refrigerator, dishwasher, large walk in pantry and pendant lights over the counter bar where family and friends can gather to enjoy a conversation with the cook. The home office situated in the front of the home off the foyer is of considerable size for a couple to work together at the same time.  The Master bedroom  ensuite's focus of attention is an oversized, walk in shower with seat which provides the ultimate showering experience by providing dual showerheads located on both the wall and ceiling. The vanities are granite which completes the well appointed look.  The Master also has a  trey ceiling. The 2nd large guest bedroom also portrays an ensuite bath with sink, tub/shower with glass door, granite vanity and cabinet over the commode.. The 3rd guest bedroom is perfect also as a flex room and has access to another full bath off  the hallway.   if you can believe it, you will love doing laundry  in this well equipped laundry room.  It has double decked shelves next to washer and dryer and the opposite wall has incredible built-ins for all your laundry needs.  An added convenience is there are  fans in every room and an irrigation system to keep your yard beautiful.  This home is well appointed home and ready to move into today.  Don't delay.  It will have a SOLD sign quickly. Closing by November 30 buyer agent recives a $5000 bonus and golf cart will be included in the full price offer. An accepted offer the buyer agent gets $2000 and no golf cart is inculded. with a Closing date of 11/30/23.
